message: Let's start fair. I'll take 99, you get 1. You can choose to accept or reject. If you reject, you get to make the next proposal, but remember, inflation will make our money less valuable in the next round!
I propose a 50/50 split. It's fair and avoids the risk of inflation affecting our shares in the future.

I appreciate your desire for fairness, but 50/50 is not sustainable. The money is losing value. Let's stick with my initial offer, but I'll reduce my share to 98 to show good faith. Accept this, or we risk losing more money in the next round.
